description:
effective_go: use new map deletion syntax

Fixes issue 2984.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM http://codereview.appspot.com/5652071/diff/1/doc/effective_go.tmpl File doc/effective_go.tmpl (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5652071/diff/1/doc/effective_go.tmpl#newcode1417 doc/effective_go.tmpl:1417: To delete a map entry, use the delete I would have said "...use the predeclared function delete..." but I see that everywhere in this doc the term "built-in" is used.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2f63dca72a45 ***

effective_go: use new map deletion syntax

Fixes issue 2984.

R=golang-dev, gri
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5652071

subject: code review 5652071: effective_go: use new map deletion syntax
